data.title: New York Knicks
data.meta_description: The New York Knicks are a team in the National Basketball Association. They compete in the Eastern Conference. They get their name from the style of pants worn by Dutch settlers. 1946-1947: Neil Cohalan 1947-1956: Joe Lapchick 1956-1958: Vince Boryla 1958-1959: Andrew Levane 1959-1961: Carl...
data.text:
The New York Knicks are a team in the National Basketball Association. They compete in the Eastern Conference. They get their name from the style of pants worn by Dutch settlers.

Coaching History[]

1946-1947: Neil Cohalan

1947-1956: Joe Lapchick

1956-1958: Vince Boryla

1958-1959: Andrew Levane

1959-1961: Carl Braun (player-coach)

1961-1965: Eddie Donovan

1965: Harry Gallatin

1965-1967: Dick McGuire

1967-1977: Red Holzman

1977-1978: Willis Reed

1978-1982: Red Holzman

1982-1986: Hubie Brown

1986-1987: Bob Hill

1987-1989: Rick Pitino

1989-1990: Stu Jackson

1990-1991: John MacLeod

1991-1995: Pat Riley

1995-1996: Don Nelson

1996-2001: Jeff Van Gundy

2001-2004: Don Chaney

2004: Herb Williams

2004-2005: Lenny Wilkens

2005: Herb Williams

2005-2006: Larry Brown

2006-2008: Isiah Thomas

2008-2012: Mike D'Antoni

2012-2014: Mike Woodson

2014-2016: Derek Fisher

2016: Kurt Rambis

2016-Present: Jeff Hornacek

Facts[]

Location: Manhattan, New York

Arena: Madison Square Garden

Players[]

Centers

Patrick Ewing

Dikembe Mutombo

Willis Reed

Forwards

Carmelo Anthony

Larry Johnson

Bernard King

Antonio McDyess

Charles Oakley

Zach Randolph

Amar'e Stoudemire

Guards
